properties.text: One of the problems with Climate Change is we feel so small and it's so large. Tomorrow the #ClimateMarch will show how big the movement is

properties.name: Alejandro Alvarez
properties.text: .@werkforpeace The #ResisDance would like to remind you that unlike unicorns, climate change is real. #ClimateMarch https://t.co/Sa6RbwhW7b

properties.name: The Climate Mobilization
properties.text: "What major energy corporations are doing is a crime on a world-historical scale."  - @EugenePuryear at @dc_dsa panel pre #climatemarch

properties.name: Patagonia Provisions
properties.text: Ready for #FacebookLive? Tune in as Timmy O'Neill prepares us for tomorrow's #ClimateMarch from Washington DC: https://t.co/RjFNHKrbdH https://t.co/PFoPvJHT40
